endpoints.description: Initiate identity verification for a prospective tenant based on provided identification information.
Retrieve the current status and results of a previously requested identity verification for a specific tenant.
Request a credit check for a prospective tenant using their financial history.
Obtain the status and outcomes of a completed credit check for a specific tenant.
Submit a request to validate and obtain a tenant's past rental history.
Access the verified detailed rental history information of a specific tenant.
Retrieve service documentation for available endpoints and their usage.
Configure notification preferences related to updates on verification checks.
Retrieve contact information and assistance options for service-related inquiries.
Request the permanent removal of data stored for a specific tenant from the system.
